scripts.deploy:optimism: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/optimism-v4-prizes-claimed subgraph.optimism.yaml

scripts.all-optimism: yarn clean && yarn prepare:optimism && yarn gen:optimism && yarn deploy:optimism
scripts.all-polygon: yarn clean && yarn prepare:polygon && yarn gen:polygon && yarn deploy:polygon
